name: Project Colossal
description:
On this empty facility, you have been put to the test and watched by a couple of unknown entities. They have injected you with a serum that if not cured quickly, you will die from various factors. 

There are quite a few puzzles and tasks that you need to go through. 

This was made for the epic  megajam, if this prototype is good, I can expand on this in the future,

Credits

This was a solo project. I programmed the game, level design, UI and some models.

The only things that I did not make was the audio and the modular parts  for the level itself. That was from a pack called Modular Sci Fi Seasons 1 and 2.
Audio is from Autunn Audio Bundle - Hutarev
